alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 3:15AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Riverside and eastern San Diego Counties through 400 AM PDT... At 315 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ocotillo Wells, or 10 miles southeast of Hwy 78 Between Borrego Springs Rd And Ocotillo Wells, moving southwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Borrego Springs, I-8 Between Pine Valley And Boulevard, I-8 Between Boulevard And Imperial County Line, Hwy 78 Between S2 And Borrego Springs Rd, Mount Laguna, Hwy 78 Between Borrego Springs Rd And Ocotillo Wells, Hwy S2 Between Shelter Valley And Agua Caliente, Hwy S22 Between Borrego Springs And Imperial County Line, Hwy S2 Vallecito Creek Rd, Ocotillo Wells, Hwy S2 Between Canebrake And Imperial County Line, Lake Morena, Potrero, Hwy S2 Between Agua Caliente And Canebrake, Fish Creek Wash, Pine Valley, Boulevard, Campo, Hwy S1 Between Lake Cuyamaca And Mount Laguna, and La Posta Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
